headline.main: RAF POUNDS BERLIN IN NEW HEAVY RAID; Blow at Nazi Capital Follows 1,500-Ton Bombing of Rhine Cities -- Fortresses Strike

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Wednesday, Sept. 1 -- The Royal Air Force bombed Berlin last night and early reports indicated the raid was a concentrated and heavy assault perhaps comparable to the 1,700-ton blockbuster attack a week ago.
abstract: Churchill pledges Allied invasion of France in accord with mil, not pol, expediency, radio s
snippet: LONDON, Wednesday, Sept. 1 -- The Royal Air Force bombed Berlin last night and early reports indicated the raid was a concentrated and heavy assault perhaps comparable to the 1,700-ton blockbuster attack a week ago....
